articles.content: Jio Cinema is available across all platforms including iOS, macOS, iPadOS, Android, Windows, Linux, Android TV, Apple TV and Fire TV.

articles.title: IPL 2023: Poor guys has only kept for 20 overs, Sourav Ganguly defends Sarfaraz Khan after poor outing vs LSG - India Today
articles.description: IPL 2023: People should not read too much into Sarfaraz Khan's performance from the first game, feels Delhi Capitals' Director of Cricket Sourav Ganguly.
articles.content: By India Today Sports Desk: Delhi Capitals' Director of Cricket Sourav Ganguly has asked for patience with Sarfaraz Khan after the player's poor outing with the glove against Lucknow Super Giants. Kh… [+1704 chars]
